name: Duess Design
tagline: Website Design Services for Small Businesses
description:
Duess Design is a well-established, dynamic custom website design agency with offices in beautiful North Vancouver, Squamish and Whistler, British Columbia. We pride ourselves in creating responsive, effective, and beautifully designed websites for small to medium sized businesses that are looking to grow online. 
With more than 19 years of experience in the ever-evolving world of online engagement, we specialize in custom web design, WordPress websites and social media services.
